QuestData.Title: The Highlord's Vision
QuestData.Description:
<Thrall's brow is furrowed.>
We were speaking with the Highlord when he was struck by a jolt of agony.
He said he could see something stirring in the Maw. Inside the Jailer's tower.
The pain seems to be getting worse. We need to find out what he's sensing.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find out what Bolvar senses inside Torghast.

Objectives.Objective: Focus on the Helm of Domination
